content.question: The proclamation most clearly provides evidence for which of the following?

choices.label: The spreading of violence associated with the Kansas-Nebraska Act
The failure of the Compromise of 1850 to lessen sectional tensions
The abolitionist roots of the Republican Party
The absence of racism in antebellum New England

content.answer: The failure of the Compromise of 1850 to lessen sectional tensions

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
